entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High 18. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:31 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Showers beginning overnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:31 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light late in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:31 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
